data.title: Grace Choi l Mama to lil.A
data.content:
Hello friends and new followers!
I'm a Sydney based Creative Artist, Illustrator, Mama, Life Lover + Founder of ‘A little bite by Grace’ and @alittlebitestudio. I am mostly known for my hand drawn line illustrations and watercolour. I tell stories with paint, pen, flowers + words and I love every second.

I TRULY BELIEVE THAT EVERYONE HAS THEIR OWN STORY. MY MISSION IS TO TRANSLATE YOUR BEAUTIFUL STORY INTO A WORK OF ART THAT YOU WOULD WANT TO KEEP AND CHERISH FOREVER.

So what's coming up? 
You will find me teaching Free Botanical Illustration workshop at @stivesvillage on the 11th of September and live illustrating at Spring Racing Style Brunch with @thestyledr on 22nd of September. I'd love you to join us! Just flick me a message!

With love,
Grace x

Photos: @snapsby_tiffany 
Flowers: @stella_____j

#newselfwales
